snippet: Proposed improvements to the train station complex in Midtown Manhattan, like fancier food spots, reveal a little-known class of habitué who isn’t waiting for a train.
abstract: Proposed improvements to Pennsylvania Station transit hub in Midtown Manhattan include plans for better dining experience and offerings for commuters; 750,000 riders move through train station each day, with many looking for something to eat before commutes that could last hours.
lead_paragraph: Proposed improvements to the train station complex in Midtown Manhattan, like fancier food spots, reveal a little-known class of habitué who isn’t waiting for a train.

headline.main: For Penn Station Diners, Nowhere to Go but Up
headline.print_headline: For Penn Station Diners, Nowhere to Go but Up
